about.description: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation of Earth system models in CMIP.
about.summary: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation of Earth system models in CMIP.

name: esmvaltool-python
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.25.0

package:
  name: esmvaltool-python
  version: 2.9.0
source:
  sha256: e8d2bcece8e985f8be5807e00bc22ae225208b6c8b82b5d2cefa6b8eeab8fb34
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/E/ESMValTool/ESMValTool-2.9.0.tar.gz
build:
  entry_points:
    - mip_convert_setup = esmvaltool.cmorizers.mip_convert.esmvt_mipconv_setup:main
    - nclcodestyle = esmvaltool.utils.nclcodestyle.nclcodestyle:_main
    - recipe_filler = esmvaltool.utils.recipe_filler:run
    - test_recipe = esmvaltool.utils.testing.recipe_settings.install_expand_run:main
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  string: pyhd8ed1ab_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - ca-certificates 2023.5.7 hbcca054_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.40 h41732ed_0
    - libexpat 2.5.0 hcb278e6_1

    - libgcc-ng 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libgomp 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h7f98852_0
    - libsqlite 3.42.0 h2797004_0
    - libuuid 2.38.1 h0b41bf4_0
    - libzlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5

    - tk 8.6.12 h27826a3_0
    - tzdata 2023c h71feb2d_0
    - wheel 0.40.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - xz 5.2.6 h166bdaf_0
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - ca-certificates 2023.5.7 hbcca054_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.40 h41732ed_0
    - libexpat 2.5.0 hcb278e6_1
    - libffi 3.4.2 h7f98852_5
    - libgcc-ng 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libgomp 13.1.0 he5830b7_0
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h7f98852_0

    - readline 8.2 h8228510_1
    - setuptools 68.0.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - setuptools-scm 7.1.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - setuptools_scm 7.1.0 hd8ed1ab_0
    - tk 8.6.12 h27826a3_0
    - tomli 2.0.1 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - typing-extensions 4.7.1 hd8ed1ab_0
    - typing_extensions 4.7.1 pyha770c72_0
    - tzdata 2023c h71feb2d_0
    - wheel 0.40.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0

    - fire

    - natsort
    - nc-time-axis
    - netCDF4
    - numpy !=1.24.3
    - openpyxl
    - packaging
    - pandas
    - progressbar2
    - prov
    - psy-maps
    - psy-reg
    - psy-simple
    - psyplot

    - python >=3.9
    - python-cdo

test:
  commands:
    - pytest -n 2 --ignore="run_test.py" --ignore="tests/unit/documentation/" -k "not
      ([diagnostic.R] or [diagnostic.jl] or [diagnostic.ncl] or test_r_lint)"
    - esmvaltool --help
    - esmvaltool data --help
    - nclcodestyle --help
    - esmvaltool colortables --help
    - test_recipe --help
  imports:
    - esmvaltool
  requires:
    - flake8
    - pytest >=3.9,!=6.0.0rc1,!=6.0.0
    - pytest-cov
    - pytest-env
    - pytest-html !=2.1.0
    - pytest-metadata >=1.5.1
    - pytest-mock
    - pytest-xdist
  source_files:
    - setup.cfg
    - tests
about:
  description: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation
    of Earth system models in CMIP.
  home: https://www.esmvaltool.org
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation
    of Earth system models in CMIP.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bouweandela
    - nielsdrost
    - remi-kazeroni
    - schlunma
    - sloosvel
    - valeriupredoi
    - zklaus
